name: GRAV (itch)
description:
Use arrow keys to move. Z key to interact.

Follow me on Twitter: https://twitter.com/tinyruin

Credits:

A game by Rick Hoppmann/tinyworlds for the r/Webgames gamejam

Sounds:

Thunder, rain and wind - Jute

Birdsong background loop - koertes

Bone, Fall, Ledge Climbing, Impact (Yo Frankie!) - Blender Foundation

Electric Sound Effects Library - Little Robot Sound Factory

Not Interested (Planet Music) - Dan Knoflicek

Forgotten tomb ambience - kindland

Metal Interactions - qubodup

Drop Outs (End Music) - Dan Knoflicek.
